N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.1 - Applications

State Regulations
(a) An application
to the Youth Facilities Project Guarantee Fund for the guarantee of a loan for
the construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation or improvement of a day care
center shall be in writing on application forms provided by the bureau of youth
facilities construction in the New York State Department of Social Services. An
original application and three copies of the application shall be filed with
the fund through the said bureau of youth facilities construction. (b) Applications to the fund shall contain
information and data with reference to: (1)

The public need for the existence of the proposed day care center at the time
and place and under the circumstances proposed. (2)

The character, experience, competency and
standing in the community of incorporators, directors, sponsors and
officers. (3)

The financial
resources and sources of future revenue of the day care center to be operated
by or on behalf of the applicant. (4)

The fitness and adequacy of the premises
and equipment to be used by the applicant. (5)

The fitness and adequacy of the personnel
to be employed in the operation of the day care center. (6)

The policies proposed to be followed by
the applicant in the operation of the day care center. (7)

The name and address of the lending
agency and a statement of the terms of the proposed loan. Notes
